issues.title: Form elements must have labels
issues.description: Ensure every form element has a label

any.message: Element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
Element does not have an explicit <label>
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
Element has no title attribute
Element has no placeholder attribute
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
  Element does not have an explicit <label>
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element has no placeholder attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

issues.title: This textinput element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title undefined, aria-label undefined, aria-labelledby undefined.
issues.description: <input type="text" class="search-box">

original_issue.message: This textinput element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title undefined, aria-label undefined, aria-labelledby undefined.

issues.title: This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.
issues.description: <input type="text" class="search-box">

original_issue.message: This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.

issues.title: Form elements do not have associated labels
issues.description: Labels ensure that form controls are announced properly by assistive technologies, like screen readers. [Learn more about form element labels](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/label).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
  Element does not have an explicit <label>
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element has no placeholder attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
